item.title: SQL Server Optimisation: Why Less Is More
item.description: One of the most important lessons, or concepts I have learned regarding performance tuning, was the concept of breaking things down. Who knew? The experts were right all along when they said, “If you’re confused by the query, SQL probably is too”.
